title: USA Population Growth and Death Rates Dashboard
description: This dashboard provides insights into the population growth and death rates in the United States of America, with breakdowns by year, age group, and sex. It highlights key metrics and visualizes trends and distributions to support demographic and public health analysis.

cards.title: Total USA Population (Latest Year)
cards.description: Sum of the population across all age and sex groups in the USA for the most recent year available.

cards.title: Total Deaths in USA (Latest Year)
cards.description: Total number of deaths in the USA for the most recent year, summed across all age and sex groups.

cards.title: Population Growth Rate (USA, Last 5 Years)
cards.value_expression: ((df[(df['location_name'] == 'United States of America') & (df['year'] == df['year'].max())]['population'].sum() - df[(df['location_name'] == 'United States of America') & (df['year'] == df['year'].max()-5)]['population'].sum()) / df[(df['location_name'] == 'United States of America') & (df['year'] == df['year'].max()-5)]['population'].sum()) * 100
cards.description: Percentage growth in total USA population over the last 5 years.

charts.title: USA Population Over Time
charts.description: Shows the trend of total population in the USA over the years.

charts.title: USA Death Rate by Age Group (Latest Year)
charts.description: Displays the total number of deaths by age group in the USA for the most recent year.

charts.title: USA Deaths by Sex (Latest Year)
charts.description: Proportion of total deaths in the USA by sex for the most recent year.
